note.p: Death: Bridge collapsed while he was riding over it near Bologne, France (22 February 1815)
Education: Edinburgh (studied medicine); Christ's College, Cambridge (botany, chemistry); MB; MD (1796, Cambridge)
Career: Professor of Chemistry, Cambridge (1813 until his death); killed when the bridge he was riding over collapsed.
